foundations-page.title: Foundations
foundations-page.description: Foundations are the visual elements needed to create engaging end-to-end user experiences. This includes guidance on iconography, typography, layout and structure.

color-page.title: Color
color-page.description: Color distinguishes our brand and helps us create consistent experiences across products.

typography-page.title: Typography
typography-page.description: Typography is our system of fonts. Each font conveys the appropriate sentiment to assist our users through each stage of their journey.

components-page.title: Components
components-page.description: Components are the reusable building blocks of our design system. Each component meets a specific interaction or UI need, and has been specifically created to work together to create patterns and intuitive user experiences.

breadcrumbs-page.title: Breadcrumbs
breadcrumbs-page.description: Breadcrumbs are a navigation system used to show a user's location in a site or app.

button-page.title: Button
button-page.description: A button triggers an event or action. They let users know what will happen next.

checkbox-page.title: Checkbox
checkbox-page.description: A checkbox is an input control that allows a user to select one or more options from a number of choices.

dropdown-menu-page.title: Dropdown Menu
dropdown-menu-page.description: A dropdown menu displays a list of actions or options to a user.

pagination-page.title: Pagination
pagination-page.description: Pagination allows you to divide large amounts of content into smaller chunks across multiple pages.

radio-page.title: Radio
radio-page.description: A radio input allows people to select only one option from a number of choices. Radio is generally displayed in a radio group.

select-page.title: Select
select-page.description: Select allows users to make a single selection or multiple selections from a list of options.

textfield-page.title: Text field
textfield-page.description: A text field is an input that allows a user to write or edit text.
